amendment.description: Page 314, line 18, after the dollar amount, insert "(reduced by $30,200,000) (increased by $30,200,000)".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 112 printed in House Report 115-297 to increase basic research in the physical and biological sciences by 0.5% of the NSF Research budget.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (TX) amendment (A110) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (TX) amendment (A110) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A110) offered by Mr. Smith (TX).
